document.full_text: like a lot of business owners, ms. gluskin devoted much of her time to her areas of expertise. "i was so wrapped up in other activities," she said, "that i lost sight of our financials."
document.title: a start-up's financial reckoning
lines_and_colors: like a lot of business owners, ms. gluskin devoted much of her time to her areas of expertise. "i was so wrapped up in other activities," she said, "that i lost sight of our financials."
